texto1:
Segment 5 route: From north of Mustang Ridge to FM1185 north of Lockhart (approx. 11 miles), following the current US 183 alignment. Main lanes (2+2) and Frontage Roads (2+2).

Segment 6 route: From FM 1185 to I-10 northeast of Seguin (approx. 29 miles). Main lanes (2+2) and Frontage Roads (2+2) to CR 218.

Direct connections at SH 45 Southeast north of Mustang Ridge, US 183 north of Lockhart and at I-10. Grade-separated crossings at 21 current & future roadways & two rail lines. Interchanges at SH 80, FM 621, FM 20 and U.S. 90. There will be no toll plazas on segments 5 & 6 of SH 130. All tolls will be collected electronically, meaning motorists will not have to slow down or stop. Traffic will be 100% free flowing.
